content.text: Match ends, Queens Park Rangers 2, Watford 0.
Second Half ends, Queens Park Rangers 2, Watford 0.
Substitution, Queens Park Rangers. Conor Washington replaces Sebastian Polter.
Goal!  Queens Park Rangers 2, Watford 0. Conor Washington (Queens Park Rangers) header from very close range to the top left corner.
Substitution, Watford. Adlène Guédioura replaces Etienne Capoue.
Substitution, Watford. Isaac Success replaces José Holebas.
Substitution, Queens Park Rangers. Joel Lynch replaces Grant Hall.
Substitution, Queens Park Rangers. James Perch replaces Ben Gladwin.
Substitution, Queens Park Rangers. Karl Henry replaces Jordan Cousins.
Substitution, Queens Park Rangers. Abdenasser El Khayati replaces Olamide Shodipo.
Substitution, Watford. Ben Watson replaces Mario Suárez.
Substitution, Watford. Sebastian Prödl replaces Miguel Britos.
Substitution, Watford. Costel Pantilimon replaces Heurelho Gomes.
Substitution, Watford. Juan Zuñiga replaces Abdoulaye Doucouré.
Substitution, Watford. Nordin Amrabat replaces Ikechi Anya.
Substitution, Watford. Christian Kabasele replaces Allan Nyom.
Second Half begins Queens Park Rangers 1, Watford 0.
First Half ends, Queens Park Rangers 1, Watford 0.
Goal!  Queens Park Rangers 1, Watford 0. Sebastian Polter (Queens Park Rangers) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the top left corner.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
